message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, I believe it will be very beneficial for you.  My initial offer is $14,500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $13,500?
